1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Relmap operators for dec type.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Cox.Type.Dec
6  ( ropsTypeDec,
7    -- * of-dec
8    consOfDec, relmapOfDec, relkitOfDec,
9    -- * alt-dec
10    consAltDec, relmapAltDec, relkitAltDec,
11    -- * to-dec
12    consToDec, relmapToDec, relkitToDec,
13  ) where
14
15import qualified Data.Ratio                        as R
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.DataPlus          as K
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core              as C
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base          as Rop
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base.Message  as Msg
20
21-- | Implementation of relational operators.
22ropsTypeDec :: (K.CContent c) => [C.Rop c]
23ropsTypeDec = Rop.rops "type"
24    [ consOfDec
25      K.& [ "of-dec E [-sign /N] [-fracle /N] [-num /N] [-denom /N]"
26            K.& "-content . -sign? -fracle? -num? -denom?" ]
27    , consAltDec
28      K.& [ "alt-dec /P [-fracle F]"
29            K.& "-term . -fracle?" ]
30    , consToDec
31      K.& [ "to-dec /P ..."
32            K.& "-term*" ]
33    ]
34
35
36-- ----------------------  of-dec
37
38-- | [of-dec /E/ -fracle \/N]  Add term \/N as fracle (fraction length) of decimal number /E/.
39--   [of-dec /E/ -num \/N]     Add term \/N as numerator of decimal number /E/.
40--   [of-dec /E/ -denom \/N]   Add term \/N as denominator of decimal number /E/.
41--   [of-dec /E/ -sign \/N]    Add term \/N as sign of decimal number /E/, i.e., -1, 0, or 1.
42--
43consOfDec :: (K.CContent c) => C.RopCons c
44consOfDec med =
45  do cops     <- Rop.getWhere   med "-where"
46     content  <- Rop.getCox     med "-content"
47     sign     <- Rop.getTermOpt med "-sign"
48     fracle   <- Rop.getTermOpt med "-fracle"
49     num      <- Rop.getTermOpt med "-num"
50     denom    <- Rop.getTermOpt med "-denom"
51     Right $ relmapOfDec med (cops, content, [sign, fracle, num, denom])
52
53-- | Create @of-dect@ relmap.
54relmapOfDec :: (K.CContent c) =>
55  C.Intmed c -> (K.CopSet c, K.Cox c, [Maybe K.TermName]) -> C.Relmap c
56relmapOfDec med = C.relmapFlow med . relkitOfDec
57
58-- | Create @of-dec@ relkit.
59relkitOfDec :: (K.CContent c) =>
60  (K.CopSet c, K.Cox c, [Maybe K.TermName]) -> C.RelkitFlow c
61relkitOfDec _ Nothing = C.relkitUnfixed
62relkitOfDec (cops, cox, ns) (Just he1) = Right kit2 where
63      he2       = K.catMaybes ns `K.headAppend` he1
64      kit2      = C.relkitLineAb False he2 flow
65      flow cs1  = do dec <- K.getDec $ K.coxRunCox cops he1 cs1 cox
66                     let cs2 = K.zipMaybe2 ns $ decContents dec
67                     Right $ cs2 ++ cs1
68
69decContents :: (K.CDec c) => K.Decimal -> [c]
70decContents dec = [sign, fracle, num, denom] where
71    sign    = K.pDec $ signum dec
72    fracle  = K.pInt $ K.decimalFracle dec
73    num     = K.pInteger $ abs $ R.numerator ratio
74    denom   = K.pInteger $ abs $ R.denominator ratio
75    ratio   = K.decimalRatio dec
76
77
78-- ----------------------  alt-dec
79
80-- | [alt-dec \/P -fracle /F/]    Alter fracle of decimal number to /F/ in term \/P.
81--
82consAltDec :: (K.CContent c) => C.RopCons c
83consAltDec med =
84    do cops    <- Rop.getWhere    med "-where"
85       term    <- Rop.getTerm     med "-term"
86       fracle  <- Rop.getMaybeCox med "-fracle"
87       Right $ relmapAltDec med (cops, term, fracle)
88
89-- | Create @alt-dec@ relmap.
90relmapAltDec :: (K.CContent c) =>
91  C.Intmed c -> (K.CopSet c, K.TermName, K.MaybeCox c) -> C.Relmap c
92relmapAltDec med = C.relmapFlow med . relkitAltDec
93
94-- | Create @alt-dec@ relkit.
95relkitAltDec :: (K.CContent c)
96  => (K.CopSet c, K.TermName, K.MaybeCox c)
97  -> C.RelkitFlow c
98relkitAltDec _ Nothing = C.relkitUnfixed
99relkitAltDec (cops, n, fracle) (Just he1) = Right kit2 where
100      ns1       = K.getTermNames he1
101      ind       = [n] `K.selectIndex` ns1
102      pick      = K.selectElems    ind
103      cut       = K.selectOthers   ind
104      fore      = K.permuteForward ind
105      he2       = K.headMap fore he1
106      kit2      = C.relkitLineAb False he2 flow
107      flow cs1  = do let run    = K.coxRunCox cops he1 cs1
108                         [c]    = pick cs1
109                         dec    = K.gDec c
110                     f' <- getMaybe (getInt . run) fracle
111                     let dec' = case f' of
112                                  Nothing -> dec
113                                  Just f  -> dec { K.decimalFracle = f }
114                     Right $ K.pDec dec' : cut cs1
115
116getMaybe :: (c -> K.Ab a) -> Maybe c -> K.Ab (Maybe a)
117getMaybe f (Just c)  = return . Just =<< f c
118getMaybe _ _         = return Nothing
119
120getInt :: (K.CContent c) => K.Ab c -> K.Ab Int
121getInt c = do d <- K.getDec c
122              return $ fromInteger $ K.decimalNum d
123
124
125-- ----------------------  to-dec
126
127-- | [to-dec \/P ...]    Convert content of term \/P ... to decimal number.
128--
129consToDec :: (K.CContent c) => C.RopCons c
130consToDec med =
131    do ns <- Rop.getTerms med "-term"
132       Right $ relmapToDec med ns
133
134-- | Create @to-dec@ relmap.
135relmapToDec :: (K.CContent c) => C.Intmed c -> [K.TermName] -> C.Relmap c
136relmapToDec med = C.relmapFlow med . relkitToDec
137
138-- | Create @to-dec@ relkit.
139relkitToDec :: (K.CContent c) => [K.TermName] -> C.RelkitFlow c
140relkitToDec _ Nothing = C.relkitUnfixed
141relkitToDec ns (Just he1)
142    | K.duplicated ns     = Msg.dupTerm ns
143    | K.newTermsExist pk  = Msg.newTerm pk he1
144    | otherwise           = Right kit
145    where
146      pk        = K.termPicker ns he1
147      he2       = K.headMap (K.forwardTerms pk) he1
148      kit       = C.relkitLine False he2 flow
149      flow cs1  = let cs = K.toDec <$> K.pickTerms pk cs1
150                  in cs ++ K.cutTerms pk cs1
151
